Function Documentation

MapID countryToOverview (  MapID  mapID  )  [inline]
 

Find the corresponding overview map to an country map.

If an underview map is supplied MAX_UINT32 is returned. If an overview map is supplied then the overview map is returned.

Returns:
The corresponding country map to an overview map.

Definition at line 90 of file MapBits.h.

bool isOverviewMap (  MapID  mapID  )  [inline]
 

Find out if a map ID is an overview map or not.

Note that a countrymap is not considered an overview map.

Returns:
True if the mapID is an overview map, false otherwise.

MapID overviewToCountry (  MapID  mapID  )  [inline]
 

Find the corresponding country map to an overview map.

If an underview map is supplied MAX_UINT32 is returned. If an country map is supplied then the country map is returned.

Returns:
The corresponding country map to an overview map.
